meanings.definition: A dish of cooked land snails, typically served as an appetizer.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served escargots in garlic butter.
meanings.sent2: I tried escargots for the first time at a fancy dinner party.
meanings.sent3: The escargots at the party were so popular, they disappeared in minutes!
meanings.sent4: The escargots on the plate looked like tiny, spiral-shaped treasures.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the escargots cooking filled the kitchen with a rich, savory scent.

meanings.definition: Land snails, especially as used for food.
meanings.sent1: The market had a fresh batch of escargots for sale.
meanings.sent2: In some countries, escargots are considered a delicacy.
meanings.sent3: The chef prepared a delicious escargots stew for the special event.
meanings.sent4: The escargots in the garden moved slowly, leaving shiny trails behind.
meanings.sent5: The escargots in the dish were carefully seasoned and cooked to perfection.
